meanings.sent1: The lifeless body lay still on the ground.
meanings.sent2: The flowers in the vase looked lifeless after a week without water.
meanings.sent3: The lifeless computer screen stared back at me, refusing to turn on.
meanings.sent4: The abandoned house stood lifeless, a ghostly reminder of its former glory.
meanings.sent5: The lifeless winter landscape was devoid of color, like a frozen painting.

meanings.definition: Lacking vitality or spirit; inactive or dull.
meanings.sent1: Her lifeless eyes showed no excitement or joy.
meanings.sent2: The party was so lifeless that even the music couldn't liven it up.
meanings.sent3: The lifeless meeting dragged on, with no one paying attention.
meanings.sent4: The lifeless performance left the audience bored and unimpressed.
meanings.sent5: The lifeless conversation lacked energy, like a deflated balloon.
